website_summaries.verdict: If you aren't offended by their colorful names, these Texas-inspired grilling dry rubs taste great.
pros: Five different types of dry rubs in the set
Large size for each container, so you'll have plenty of dry rub available for multiple grilling sessions
Works well on many kinds of meats
cons: No seasonings, only dry rubs in the set
Has a high price point per ounce

customer_reviews.title: Really wanting to like this product ***edited***
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this product, sadly when we went to take the lids off the “safety/freshness” seal also came off when unscrewing the lid.. like the seal isn’t sticking to the jar. This concerns me, 4/5 of the lids did this. **** Update **** The company reached out and explained why this has happened, offered a full refund / return. I explained I wanted to keep the product and just wanted them to be aware of the issue/concern. Overall I am extremely pleased with how quickly and professionally they handled this matter. I would recommend this run to anyone - and I’ll be purchasing again for a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kayte Wigginton

customer_reviews.title: It's good, work perfect.
customer_reviews.text: L M A O!!! My first review was rejected, because I put the name of this STUFF in my review!! Guess I'm not allowed to say it's Great STUFF!!! LoL... Highly recommend this STUFF.... This STUFF is a Great Gift idea!! I really like the NO STUFF!! Just be sure Not to use the real name of this STUFF when you write a review!!! LoL...
customer_reviews.author: S. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seasoning, a lot of bang for your buck here!
customer_reviews.text: Friends of ours had a couple of these seasonings and my husband really liked them. I found this larger sampler on Amazon and went for it, he loved them all! He made chicken and steak that very same night with it and it was delicious. Our friends who only had a few told us that they want to buy the whole sampler package now so they can try the ones they don't already have. Each individual seasoning is way bigger than I thought it was going to be, I didn't look at the size before I ordered it but I was pleasantly surprised at how much of each I got in this sampler. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: balltr

customer_reviews.title: Some good, some bad
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this assortment of seasonings for almost 4 months now. The containers are big, and should last a while! The only negative thing I have to say is that a couple of the containers came completely unsealed. (The special s*** and the bull s***) these two flavors are very bland for me. Not sure if them coming unsealed would have affected the flavor, but definitely a quality control issue for the company to consider. I will continue to use the other seasonings.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Love these seasonings!
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with Chicken shit originally, and so did my husband, the main cook in the home. We ran out, and knew we had to have more. Got this for a great deal! And its all good! Product packaging will have you laughing a lot also!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Alred

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this shit!
customer_reviews.text: One of our grandson's asked for a couple of different flavors of this a few years ago and he loved it. Each year we would buy him one or two different flavors and he always liked them and would put them on his "wish list" for next year. This year we bought him the Sampler pack so he could try all of them and he was very excited about getting all the different varieties. I expect he'll have even more flavors on his "wish list" for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in TN

customer_reviews.title: With the exception of sweet things and pre-packaged foods
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars. My husband puts these seasonings on EVERYTHING. With the exception of sweet things and pre-packaged foods, he seasons all of his food with one of these bottles. Definitely a good buy. Will definitely purchase again once we run out. Which will probably be in another year since these bottles are huge. I put them in eggs, on chicken, on beef, on veggie dishes, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love them but they all should be sold individually on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them but they all should be sold individually on Amazon!! Favorite, Good S***. Second, chicken s***, third, special s***. Least favorite, Aw s***.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Wills

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chicken shit was the absolute best. The rest... well... while not "shit", they weren't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: ITEM IS NOT AS DESCRIBED AND YOU CAN'T RETURN IT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift but what I received was a bunch of spices thrown into a box loose. One of the spices broke open and there was spice all over the place. Clearly I cannot give this items to anyone and now I am out almost $60 for a product I can't use. I wanted the boxed set not just loose spices - I could have done that on my own. I wanted to return it but I can't unless I want to spend $20.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste!
customer_reviews.text: Got these season for my son-in-law’s birthday. He loves to grill and as already tried 3 of the flavors and loved the taste.. the cute names on the bottles make super conversations with guest. I plan on ordering another set for my boyfriend birthday in February.. they are a little pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: they are amazing. We have used them every single day/night since ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought my husband was crazy for spending this much on all these spices. Not now... they are amazing. We have used them every single day/night since opening the package. We use it on meats, veggies, eggs, tofu... you name it. They are ALL incredible. So worth it. And the bottles are HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: HokieKristen28

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Fairly spendy for a 'typical' product. None of the flavors is spectacular, and the "Aw Shit" is very spicy and too bold for the average person. You're essentially paying a hefty premium for the unique name. Good product to impress guests, tho.
customer_reviews.author: d37

customer_reviews.title: Order was missing an item and different one was substituted.
customer_reviews.text: This order was going to be a Father's Day gift so did not have time to return or exchange. The seasoning Chicken Shit was missing from set and (2 ) Bull Shit seasonings were in box instead. The seasonings are excellent to use and enhance food wonderfully, but was very disappointed in the order since the missing one was one of the main seasonings we were looking forward to using..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Spices
customer_reviews.text: This is really like these spices. Cost has steered me away. I bought them as a gift for someone who cooks for groups. Hopefully they are able to get in local stores so there is no waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with packaging as shown
customer_reviews.text: This is a very clever gift, and the package it is supposed to come in is what makes it so humorous and perfect. We received loose seasoning containers without the outside box. This is too costly a gift to not be complete. Very dissatisfied. When an item is marked as not eligible for return, it should live up to the standards it portrays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where's the product box?
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that this actual product, the seasoning itself, is great. In fact, it is so good that I wanted to give this set to a friend. When I received my order, the five containers in this sampler were just thrown into a shipping box. This was definitely NOT a gift worthy appearance. I was under the impression the seasonings were actually contained in an actual product box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have not cooked with this load of sh!t. lol But the folks that received it, loved it. I may need to get this sh!t for myself. Food is best friends and family, sometimes better with friends. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift to the right person
customer_reviews.text: I have not tasted any of the rubs, as I gave it as a gift. However, it was a big hit with the recipient. He read each bottle at least twice while laughing.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed with the size of the bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the size of the bottles. I was expecting a small one (thought it was high priced) but they are very large (12 oz) and definately worth the price. After seeing the size of the bottles I believe it is priced fair. I have not tried them yet tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed when product arrived. The listing shows that it comes in a box but I just received 5 bottles of seasoning. This is a Christmas gift and it is NON-RETURNABLE. Not sure what to do with it now. It's going to look stupid without the box. Very mis-leading
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: these things are amazing!! and they are HUGE the good 🤫 is amazing and is a great flavoring for radishes when ur substituting potatoes. these spices make all vegetables taste good.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca green

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these seasonings so much! These are my absolute favorite on the market. My ONLY complaint is that I bought these for a gift and the box shown in the picture did not actually come with it. That was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Good for a laugh not a taste
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt a big fan of flavor great novelty gift though friends got a riot out names at barbecues...
customer_reviews.author: RiRi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift for a couple of the guys in my family and they are all still talking about how funny they are and yet how amazing they taste
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the names fool you.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good seasonings. Use them all the time. Especially good for the-barbecue and just about any dish you can imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Tijerasman

customer_reviews.title: Fun name and great seasoning
customer_reviews.text: We had these seasonings while at a hunting camp in British Columbia. The names a hoot and we loved their flavors when we bbq'd some moose steaks up there. Came home and ordered this set.
customer_reviews.author: sue mccune

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing flavor.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my father as a gift. As a frequent cook and grill master he has used these often. They’re a great conversation starter for people who join us for barbecues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. My wife didn't want to spend the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. My wife didn't want to spend the money, but now it's about all we use for our spices. It's not just a catchy name, the product actually tastes great. Our favorite is the Aw S---. little spicy. Large amount in each one. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very important to have in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves using these so much he asked for the set for Christmas, he was thrilled when he opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Neenah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seasonings!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these seasonings several times and also gifted them. They never disappoint and a little goes a long way. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reptilia

customer_reviews.title: Contains sugar
customer_reviews.text: Contained sugar. I'm diabetic and Can t use. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: And then they gave stellar reviews and said it was the best seasoning they had used
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gage gift, we all had a few laughs. And then they gave stellar reviews and said it was the best seasoning they had used.
customer_reviews.author: d.e.a

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: These were featured in a nice gift box but arrived in a clear plastic bag. Not a single bottle was sealed which gives me anxiety. I think buyers need to know that what they see is not what they are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: awesome game ,and if you see Mickey Moe Don't kill him

customer_reviews.title: Special Sh*t seasonings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday . We have a treager smoker grill & these seasonings taste great .Good price. We have bought a few other boxes for gifts as well. The people where happy .

customer_reviews.title: Great rubs for your meat
customer_reviews.text: This made the perfect gift to a grilling friend no to mention the hilariously funny labels. The gift scored a 10/10!

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son for his birthday! Everyone loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Father's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Father loves it. May get him another for Christmas because he just can't cook without it.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging not Included
customer_reviews.text: We love this product and wanted to share it with others. However we were very disappointed when the seasoning did not arrive in the speciality box as advertised. That is part of the presentation. If we had known this - definitely would have purchased it elsewhere for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at a vendor show in Vegas last year. I got some for myself and all of my kids, we all LOVED IT! My oldest son requested it again this year, so I ordered from their site through Amazon. Great seasonings!

customer_reviews.title: This stuff don't stink!
customer_reviews.text: Sent to a friend as a Christmas gift, this pile is getting rave reviews!

customer_reviews.title: Great dry rubs!

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Our kin down in Texas got us hooked on these spices and we've never turned back. Love, Love, Love these. They make everything taste better.

customer_reviews.title: Love the name
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read it right, I didn’t realize how big they were going to be. So far we love all the favors and have used them for many things when we can’t find what a seasoning in the store. Plus the names are super funny.

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical!
customer_reviews.text: These actually taste excellent, but that's only when you stop laughing. Great product

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this seasoning!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to cook and he just praised the Big 5 Sampler pack of seasoning.

customer_reviews.title: Funny AND tasty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this more as a gag gift for my son and daughter-in-law, but that it tastes good is an extra bonus

customer_reviews.title: Family Favourite
customer_reviews.text: The only seasoning our family uses for the BBQ.Everyone, even the kids, seem to love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!

customer_reviews.title: These spices are very good. The best collection i've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: These spices are very good. The best collection i've ever seen. I have a group of friends that are buying them now so my BBQ wont be special in our group but thats ok.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend as a gift and I am very disappointed that the big 5 didn’t come in the box that it advertised. They came in the yellow bubble envelope. The clear bag was open as well. I only received 4 of the 5 seasonings. This item is not eligible for return so I am stuck with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Large and simple
customer_reviews.text: Large size nice variety. Flavors are simple. Very good to teach tennagers to cook

customer_reviews.title: It didn't come with the box
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift their awsome smell amazing and are pretty big bottals but for the price i thought i was getting the box with it they just sent it in a plastic clear bag
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good product, disappointed about the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I learned about the product from a friend and was excited to get 2 packs as a funny/sensible holiday gift for some food lovers. But I’m dissapointed that the product came in these plastic bags and not in the “S*** Load Big 5” box that is shown in the other customer images on the product page. I still want the product, but this is intended to be a gift that I wanted to present in the official box, not just a plastic bag of spice shakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, but varying amount?...
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff! Only downside is that there’s varying levels of spices in the bottles when I had just opened the package. Even looks like someone used part of my “Aw ****” one...

product_meta.title: Special Shit - Shit Load Big 5 Sampler (Pack of 5 Seasonings with 1 each of Bull, Special, Good, Aw, Chicken
product_meta.description: From the master kitchens of Big Cock Ranch comes the Shitload, the perfectly balanced dry rub sample set that provides all the Shit you could ever need for legendary barbecues and grilling.
feature_bullets: From the master kitchens of Big Cock Ranch comes the ShitLoad, the perfectly balanced Special Shit dry rub sample set that provides all the Shit you could ever need for legendary barbecues and grilling.
Made in Austin, Texas, home to some of America's best BBQ. Cook with American pride.
The Shit Load is our most popular set for the avid grillmaster with all six of our crowd-pleasing, mouth-watering, finger-licking seasonings in one big box.
Contains 1 each of the following items: Bull Shit, Special Shit, Good Shit, Aw Shit and Chicken Shit
